channel.title: HB 1591 - Providing remedies for defendant survivors of domestic violence, sexual assault, or human trafficking.

item.title: First reading, referred to Community Safety.
item.description: First reading, referred to Community Safety.

item.title: 👍Larry Jefferson - Director, Washington State Office of Public Defense
item.description: Larry Jefferson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Director, Washington State Office of Public Defense.

item.description: Tanya Crocker signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Tanya Crocker.
